Options

Autorun

Paragraph Mode

When enabled, Autorun will have the highlighter run automatically whenever you visit a new page.


This mode makes the highlighter apply one color to an entire paragraph, instead of changing colors every sentence as is the default.

Dyslexic Font

Font Size

Turn this on, and all highlighted text will be rendered in the dyslexia-friendly Arial Sans-Sarif font.


Adjust the size of the highlighted text to your liking.
